name: Kick it 3D!
description:
Fast-paced multiplayer kick action: this is Kick it 3D!

Hit the targets in an arcade, dynamic and multiplayer battle to become the best kicker of them all. Test your skills and challenge the world in amazing locations to play your way up to the top ranking.

Super easy to play but hard to master!

KEY FEATURES:

• Intuitive Flick Kicking – Sweep your finger across the ball to drive and curve the ball
• Fantastic locations to play in from all around the world
• Use the weather to your advantage by curving the trajectory
• Intuitive arcade gameplay means there’s always action!

With simple, fast gameplay, Kick it 3D! is easy to play and offers endless multiplayer fun!

Download Kick it 3D! NOW!
